body.p: This document is an overall guide for all new committers, including both technical details and policy details. For the former, see the chapters on the Subversion VCS, the Bugzilla bug tracking system, and the SSH Quick-Start Guide.

h2.a: &os; Documentation Project Primer for New Contributors

body.p: This primer covers everything you will need to know in order to start contributing to the &os; Documentation Project, from the tools and software you will be using (both mandatory and recommended) to the philosophy behind the Documentation Project.
A guide for &os; ports committers. This includes the canonical Table of __FreeBSD_version Values.
body.h2: How to build the &os; Web Pages.
body.p: This document describes how to build and update the &os; Web pages from the SVN repository by hand.
